title: TVLine Items: Martha Stewart Documentary Trailer, Love Is Blind Reunion and More
description: Martha Stewart is the original influencer in a trailer for Netflix’s upcoming documentary about the lifestyle icon. “Through intimate and revealing interviews with the icon herself and those from her inner circle, [director] R.J. Cutler’s definitive documentary on Martha Stewart traces her rise from teenage model to her reign as the original influencer and America’s […]
author: Vlada Gelman
excerpt: A documentary about Martha Stewart will be released on Netflix later this month -- watch a trailer!
text: Martha Stewart is the original influencer in a trailer for Netflix‘s upcoming documentary about the lifestyle icon. “Through intimate and revealing interviews with the icon herself and those from her inner circle, [director] R.J. Cutler’s definitive documentary on Martha Stewart traces her rise from teenage model to her reign as the original influencer and America’s first self-made female billionaire,” reads the official logline. Martha premieres Wednesday, Oct. 30 on the streamer. Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well… * Love Is Blind‘s Season 7 reunion special, hosted by Nick and Vanessa Lachey, will stream Wednesday, Oct. 30 at 9 pm ET/6 pm PT on Netflix. * ESPN has signed former NFL player Cam Newton as a commentator, primarily for its morning debate show First Take. Newton will make his debut on the series Friday, Oct. 11. * A new trailer for Nautilus, a live-action series inspired by Jules Verne’s Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea, has been released. Initially ordered (then scrapped) at Disney+, the 10-episode series will now air Stateside on AMC (in 2025) and on Prime Video in the U.K. (releasing Friday, Oct. 25). * Watch a trailer for Asia, a natural history series narrated by Sir David Attenborough, which features  original music by the K-pop group SEVENTEEN and composers Jacob Shea and Laurentia Editha for Bleeding Fingers. The program premieres on BBC America and AMC+ in 2025. Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
html:
Martha Stewart is the original influencer in a trailer for Netflix‘s upcoming documentary about the lifestyle icon.

“Through intimate and revealing interviews with the icon herself and those from her inner circle, [director] R.J. Cutler’s definitive documentary on Martha Stewart traces her rise from teenage model to her reign as the original influencer and America’s first self-made female billionaire,” reads the official logline.

Martha premieres Wednesday, Oct. 30 on the streamer.

Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well…

* Love Is Blind‘s Season 7 reunion special, hosted by Nick and Vanessa Lachey, will stream Wednesday, Oct. 30 at 9 pm ET/6 pm PT on Netflix.

* ESPN has signed former NFL player Cam Newton as a commentator, primarily for its morning debate show First Take. Newton will make his debut on the series Friday, Oct. 11.

* A new trailer for Nautilus, a live-action series inspired by Jules Verne’s Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea, has been released. Initially ordered (then scrapped) at Disney+, the 10-episode series will now air Stateside on AMC (in 2025) and on Prime Video in the U.K. (releasing Friday, Oct. 25).

* Watch a trailer for Asia, a natural history series narrated by Sir David Attenborough, which features  original music by the K-pop group SEVENTEEN and composers Jacob Shea and Laurentia Editha for Bleeding Fingers. The program premieres on BBC America and AMC+ in 2025.

Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
